Resources.Src:
.field-container label { font-weight: bold; display: block; margin-bottom: 0.5rem; }
.field-container { margin-bottom: 1rem; }

DynamicFieldSettings.Code:
<my-greeting></my-greeting>

<script type="module">
  class MyGreeting extends HTMLElement {
    constructor() {
      super();
      this.attachShadow({ mode: 'open' });
    }

    async connectedCallback() {
      const React = await import('https://esm.sh/react@18.2.0');
      const ReactDOMClient = await import('https://esm.sh/react-dom@18.2.0/client');

      const { useState } = React;
      const { createRoot } = ReactDOMClient;

      function App() {
        const [name, setName] = useState('');
        const [greeting, setGreeting] = useState('');

        const handleClick = () => setGreeting(`Hello, ${name || 'Stranger'}! 👋`);

        return React.createElement(
          'div',
          { style: { textAlign: 'center', marginTop: '50px' } },
          React.createElement('h2', null, 'Simple React Example'),
          React.createElement('input', {
            placeholder: 'Enter your name',
            value: name,
            onInput: e => setName(e.target.value),
            style: { padding: '8px', fontSize: '16px' }
          }),
          React.createElement(
            'button',
            { onClick: handleClick, style: { marginLeft: '8px', padding: '8px 16px' } },
            'Greet Me'
          ),
          greeting && React.createElement('p', { style: { color: 'blue', marginTop: '16px' } }, greeting)
        );
      }

      const mountPoint = document.createElement('div');
      this.shadowRoot.appendChild(mountPoint);
      const root = createRoot(mountPoint);
      root.render(React.createElement(App));
    }
  }

  customElements.define('my-greeting', MyGreeting);
</script>
